Just a real quick question, I don't mean to be a pest on asking or anything, but is there any chance that you could talk to the skin design team about this skin? I feel as if this would be a great skin for Urgot. Thanks for lookin at this if you get the chance at all, and again, sorry for asking something when I know that rioters like you are quite busy already.

Please excuse that thumbnail.

Somehow more horrifying than the original. You can at least explain that, have some warped frame of reference if Urgot scuttles and lurches towards you. But Yohgot? How can you mentally prepare for such a thing, dead cherry eyed, lifting an inexplicable cannon to fire...is that jelly?
